desc: When {c_important}Poison Trap{/c} or {c_important}Death Trap{/c} activates, you gain {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%+|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance against {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} and Crowd Controlled enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:CRIT_CHANCE}{/c} seconds.
name: Trap Mastery
